Science.Q1: Radiocarbon is produced in the atmosphere as a result of
Science.A: collision between fast neutrons and nitrogen nuclei present in the atmosphere
Science.B: action of ultraviolet light from the sun on atmospheric oxygen
Science.C: action of solar radiations particularly cosmic rays on carbon dioxide present in the atmosphere

mali.Q2: It is easier to roll a stone up a sloping road than to lift it vertical upwards because
mali.A: work done in rolling is more than in lifting
mali.B: work done in lifting the stone is equal to rolling i
mali.C: work done in both is same but the rate of doing work is less in rolling
mali.D: work done in rolling a stone is less than in lifting it

mali.Q2: The absorption of ink by blotting paper involves
mali.C: diffusion of ink through the blotting

mali.Q2: Siphon will fail to work if
mali.A: the densities of the liquid in the two vessels are equal
mali.B: the level of the liquid in the two vessels are at the same height
mali.C: both its limbs are of unequal length
mali.D: the temperature of the liquids in the two vessels are the same
